attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prison shouldn`t be seen as the soft option for criminals they are they to be punished . Criminals in prison shouldn`t have comfy beds , tv`s playstations etc.... . They should work at least 8 hours a day growing their own food and other tasks to pay their debt back to society . For young offenders they should be forced to do 8 hours military drill a day in addition to studying .

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Harderprisons/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
